item.title: Tesla CEO Elon Musk Backs Lemonade Halving Insurance Rates For FSD-Driven Miles: ‘It Increases Safety So Much’
item.description: Lemonade on Wednesday launched the Lemonade Autonomous Car insurance, designed specifically for self-driving cars, starting with Tesla FSD.

item.title: T1 Energy Dives 12% As Culper Research Takes A Short Position Saying Company Is A ‘Failed EV Battery SPAC’

item.title: Eaton Reportedly Weighing Separation Of $5B Vehicle Unit
item.description: As per a report from Bloomberg News, Eaton is working with an adviser to explore a sale or spinoff of the unit.
